p: Looking at critically ill patients, we observed a very high mortality rate, of 47% (55/117), in agreement with Wu et al., reporting 52.4% fatality rate among patients with ARDS ( Wu et al., 2020). Cummings et al. (2020) reported 39% of deaths among 257 critically ill patients from New York City; in their study they defined critically ill all those requiring mechanical ventilation or high-level supplemental oxygen. When applying the same definition, 273 patients were identified in our cohort, 129 of which (47%) died in hospital. The in-hospital fatality rate is consistently very high in all studies on critically ill patients.
